description:
The gang’s flame pressure is greater than Byakuran had expected, and they are all granted permission to participate in the Choice game. Countless cards fall from Byakuran’s giant head. Byakuran explains that each one of them must choose one of these cards at random to determine a battlefield. He goes on to explain that in this game, the conditions of the battle are chosen by each person’s luck. Giannini is nervous about picking a card from their enemy’s set, but Irie assures them that Byakuran would never cheat in Choice. Persuaded by his friends to go on and choose a card, Tsuna picks one of the cards…
Source: crunchyroll
